an4.163:4.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.163:5.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.163:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī;
an4.163:5.3: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.163:5.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:5.8: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā dandhaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.163:5.9: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.163:6.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.163:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī;
an4.163:6.3: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.163:6.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:6.8: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.163:6.9: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.163:7.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.163:7.2: Idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:7.3: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:7.4: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an4.163:7.5: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:7.6: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:7.7: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:7.11: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā dandhaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.163:7.12: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.163:8.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.163:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati … pe … dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ … pe … tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:8.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.163:8.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.163:8.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
